Wenn der Song beispielsweise in den deutschen Radiostationen gesendet 
werden soll, wäre eine "Mitgliedschaft" bei Sony, Warner oder Universal 
erforderlich. Kann mir allerdings nicht vorstellen, das die Major-Labels 
dem Künstler hier hinterher hecheln - damit es niemand falsch versteht, was 
ich hier ausdrücken will: Sony, Warner und Universal bestimmen weiterhin 
fast alle Radiocharts.

captions.text:
Good evening I'm just a human
I speak for no one, but myself
I've hacked into the broadcasting stations worldwide

and i send this message out like this into the world
and i have to hurry up before they cut off the sound...

therefore there is just a „now“, never a „later“
what if my child asks me once why didn’t I see it

„But dad, even my history teacher said
in your time humans made some big mistakes“

In that case i wouldn’t want to flee in excuses
and this is the reason why we have to finally stand up

we have to face it... no big hero is coming to save us
the heroes are ourselves – the revolution is now

PEACE – therefore i speak, therefore i stand
PEACE – no claim, i live it

PEACE – because no matter what, I’ll surely never go to war
Because i wont target my brothers and sisters

This is my message to everyone who’s watching right now
PEACE – MIR – FRIEDEN – PAZ

This is my message to media and politics
PEACE – MIR – FRIEDEN – PAZ

Whilst thousands are fighting outside, to state what they want
you hear from the television palaces...

Nothing! They are way too busy, with high volume
agitating humans, to form new enemy stereotypes

warlike agitation of the installed press
journalists help their clients to instigate crisis

the reporting gets weaker, the history gets forgotten
we are unwilling to give away our children for your goals

We are humans! We are sisters and brothers
and we know from our past where hate could lead us

especially here – especially we, don’t want this to happen
and for this attitude activists get attacked

what? You read what the hacks are writing
and they are targeting the „We“ which acts peacefully

getting defamed, generalized and discredited
they are calling freedom of expression a shitstorm – the shitstorm is them

PEACE – therefore we speak, therefore we stand
PEACE – no claim, we live it

PEACE – because no matter what we'll surely never go to war
Because we wont target at our brothers and sisters

This is our message to Brussels and Berlin
PEACE – MIR – FRIEDEN – PAZ

The message to Moskow and Washington DC
PEACE – MIR – FRIEDEN – PAZ

peace is not „right“ - peace is not „left“
peace is the inner voice in your heart

peace is the path – peace is the sense
you can only loose wars – but only win peace

PEACE – but now works the propaganda machinery
battalions marching, when tanks form at borders

mass-psychology out of thought-factories
when they work on manipulative tactics

they're targeting our thoughts unavoidable, subliminal
to guide what we think of „the Russians“...

What nonsense! Because they are 140 million humans, just like me
with whom i have more in common than those in politics

and nobody wants war, except of banks which loan
both sides money to collect the debts plus interest afterwards

and arms industries, which earn from shots,
crying mothers don’t count, they are addicted to profit

and no! This has nothing to do with any religion
nationality, darker or lighter skin tone

everyone who believes this is mindless, we are sitting in the same boat
viva la revolution – raise your hands up

PEACE – therefore we speak, therefore we stand
PEACE – no claim, we live it

PEACE – because no matter what we'll surely never go to war
Because we wont target our brothers and sisters

This is our message to every single human
PEACE – MIR – FRIEDEN – PAZ

This is our message to the whole world
PEACE – MIR – FRIEDEN – PAZ

title: Kilez More - PEACE | FRIEDEN | МИР | PAZ
